column2: tomas rey our baby tomas rey benavidez was taken early to heaven above on wednesday
column4: 2015. tomas is survived by his parents

column11: david rey benevidez. funeral services are pending at this time please call garcia mortuary for more information. tomas' care is entrusted to:garcia motuary717 stover ave. swalbuquerque
